item.title: Kotlin: Cache Managment
item.description: Kotlin Cache Management # In computer science, we always say that there are two things that are complicated: naming variables and managing the cache! And that’s absolutely true. Unfortunately, this is a recurring problem in mobility since we must save as much as possible the network consumption of the mobile device we have in our hands: network loss weak networks (Edge, 3G,…) … It is therefore important to know how to manage data caching in order to provide a meaningful user experience.
